name: Evolve Pilates Studio
description: Evolve Pilates Studio is a reformer Pilates studio dedicated to inspiring and empowering individuals through the transformative practice of Pilates. They offer classes for all fitness levels

name: Southern Soul Yoga
address: 3700 W. Brainerd Rd Ste 107, Chattanooga, TN 37411
description: Southern Soul Yoga offers a variety of yoga classes and specializes in heated power yoga. They also offer hot Pilates and hybrid custom Pilates reformer classes. They highlight being Black-owned

name: Athletic Reformer (part of Southern Soul Yoga)
address: 7550 East Brainerd Road Ste. 107, Chattanooga, TN 37421
description: This is a signature class designed to harness the latest insights from biomechanics and physical therapy for a dynamic and impactful workout, blending innovation with high energy. It is part of Southern Soul Yoga, which is Black-owned

name: Nashville Black Wellness Collective
address: Nashville, TN (Specific studio address not readily available, but they organize community wellness events)
description: This collective aims to bring the Black community together through experiences that blend movement and mindfulness, including yoga and other wellness activities. While not exclusively a Pilates studio, they are a prominent Black-owned wellness organization in Nashville that promotes movement

name: Work It Pilates Studio
address: Nashville, TN (Specific address not readily available, but mentioned in a list of Black-owned studios)
description: Mentioned as a Black-owned Pilates studio in Nashville, dedicated to the core principles of Pilates
